scaleSSD.engine¶

scaleSSD.engine.detection_engine¶

class scaleSSD.engine.detection_engine.DetectionEngine(model, input_size, loss, lr, epochs)¶

Bases: pytorch_lightning.core.lightning.LightningModule

This is a class responsible for coordinating the train procedure

Parameters

  • model (nn.Module) – the model to train

  • input_size (tuple[int, int]) – the size of the input expected by the model

  • loss (ODLoss) – instance of ODLoss, to use for training

  • lr (float) – initial learning rate for the optimizer

  • epochs (int) – number of training epochs. used for lr scheduling

configure_optimizers()¶

Handle optimizers for training procedure

Returns

the configured optimizer

Return type

torchl.optim

forward(x, step_tag='test')¶

Forward input to model output

Parameters

  • x (torch.Tensor) – input x

  • step_tag (str) – type of step ( train, val, test )

Returns

output of the model

Return type

sequence of torch.Tensors and lists

get_test_preds()¶

Get the predicted boxes on test dataset

Returns

the predicted boxes

Return type

dict

handle_step(batch, step_tag)¶

Handle all different steps of the train procedure

Parameters

  • batch (list) – the next batch to input to the model

  • step_tag (str) – the tag specifying the step of the train procedure

Returns

the calculated loss

Return type

torch.Tensor

test_step(batch, batch_idx)¶

Handle the test step

Parameters

  • batch (list) – the next batch to input to the model

  • batch_idx (int) – the integer idx of the batch

Returns

the calculated test loss

Return type

torch.Tensor

training: bool¶
training_step(batch, batch_idx)¶

Handle the training step

Parameters

  • batch (list) – the next batch to input to the model

  • batch_idx (int) – the integer idx of the batch

Returns

the calculated train loss

Return type

torch.Tensor

update_test_preds(img_ids, batch_bboxes, batch_scores, batch_classes, batch_orig_sizes)¶

Update test predictions. Alter sizes

Parameters

  • img_ids (list) – A list of images ids

  • batch_bboxes (list) – A list of all the batch boxes

  • batch_scores (list) – A list of all the batch scores

  • batch_classes (list) – A list of all the batch classes

  • batch_orig_sizes (list) – A list of all the batch original sizes

Parameters
